item.title: A deep dive into Data Visualization, D3.js and SVG
item.description: Data Visualization and D3.js Sections: What is Data Visualization Types of Visual Diagrams D3 API Docs List of D3 Modules Selections and Data Enter and Append SVG Basic Shapes Scales and Axis Enter and Update Exit and Merge Transitions Force Layout D3 and Vuejs Data Visualization Best Practices General Data Visualization Resources Data Visualization Experts and Companies GitBook Link Github Repo What is Data Visualization Data visualization is the presentation of data in a pictorial or graphical format.
